mapper.update:
update customer
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=INTEGER},
real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT},
nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
credentials_type = #{credentialsType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
credentials_num = #{credentialsNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
interest_id = #{interestId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wechat_open_id = #{wechatOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qq_open_id = #{qqOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
microblog_open_id = #{microblogOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
occupation_id = #{occupationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
front_portrait_url = #{frontPortraitUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
back_portrait_url = #{backPortraitUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
head_portrait_url = #{headPortraitUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source = #{source,jdbcType=TINYINT},
cust_status = #{custStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
cust_password = #{custPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sign_name = #{signName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
voice_url = #{voiceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
identity_status = #{identityStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
token_code = #{tokenCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
other_relation = #{otherRelation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_man = #{createMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_man = #{modifyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update customer set phone = #{phone,jdbcType=INTEGER}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, credentials_type = #{credentialsType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, credentials_num = #{credentialsNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, interest_id = #{interestId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wechat_open_id = #{wechatOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq_open_id = #{qqOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, microblog_open_id = #{microblogOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, occupation_id = #{occupationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, front_portrait_url = #{frontPortraitUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, back_portrait_url = #{backPortraitUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, head_portrait_url = #{headPortraitUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source = #{source,jdbcType=TINYINT}, cust_status = #{custStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, cust_password = #{custPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sign_name = #{signName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, voice_url = #{voiceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, identity_status = #{identityStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, token_code = #{tokenCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, other_relation = #{otherRelation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_man = #{createMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_man = #{modifyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
